1.title: Be respectful.
1.body: No harassment, bigotry, hate speech, discrimination, flaming, or trolling.

2.title: No spam.
2.body: Do not post anything that could be considered spam. This includes using bot commands in the general chatrooms, text such as copypasta, deliberately-repeated instances of the same message, and unsolicited server links and advertisements.

3.title: Keep content appropriate.
3.body: NSFW or grotesque content is not permitted on this server.  This includes usernames, nicknames, avatars, and custom statuses.

4.title: No illegal activity.
4.body: Do not participate in illicit and illegal activity, such as piracy, discussing how to pirate, discussing how to access illegal drugs, or impersonation.

5.title: Avoid sensitive topics.
5.body: Refrain from discussing hard politics, dark subject matter, or other sensitive topics.

6.title: English only.
6.body: Please keep the majority of chat within the English language.  Exceptions can be made if a certain language is the topic of discussion.
